ComicInfo.Summary:
After being betrayed and trapped by Japanese forces all looks lost for Cassidy and her band of freedom fighters. But a sacrifice by one of the team members leads to a daring escape. Safe from the Japanese for the time being Cassidy is devastated by the loss of one of the most important people in her life. Can she go on fighting the rising enemy bent on world domination or will this latest loss make her give up for good? Little does she know it's a decision that could alter history itself?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Billy Tucci (a) & Sabine Rich (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Franchesco! | 2 | C | Cover C | Pasquale Qualano (a) & Alessia Nocera (c) | 3 | RE | Retailer Exclusive, Limited to 500 | Franchesco! | 4 |
